idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 3; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.1.3000

descript.abstract: Polygons defining zones for Elementary Schools for New York City.
descript.purpose: Elementary School Zoning information was transcribed into GIS to enable spatial analysis and web communication efforts. This data is for reference purposes only. Questions or concerns about this data should be forwared to the NYC Department of Education Office of Enrollment 212-374-5426 or 311.

status.update: REQUIRED: The frequency with which changes and additions are made to the data set after the initial data set is completed.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: NYC School District that the poygon falls in.
attr.attrdefs: Comparison to NYC School District Boundaries

attr.attrdef: Internal code used to reference all schools associated with the zone
Bourough that the polygon resides in.
attr.attrdefs: Comparison against NYC Borough Boundary Information

attrvai.attrva: Data has not always been correctly updated and may not reflect most recent activity to the polygon

attr.attrdef: Original Date of Definition for the Polygon

attrvai.attrva: Data has not always been correctly updated and may not reflect most recent activity to the polygon

attr.attrdef: Text Description to assist in understanding the zone data for the polygon.
